description:
This market will resolve according to the driver who wins the 2026 NASCAR Daytona 500, scheduled for February 15, 2026, 2:30 PM ET.

The market will resolve based on the official final race results published by NASCAR following the conclusion of the race. The official final results include any applied time penalties or official adjustments made by NASCAR at the time of publication. Any disqualifications or result changes made after publication of the official final results will not affect market resolution. The timing of the podium ceremony does not determine the result; only NASCAR’s published final results will be used.

If at any point it becomes impossible for a listed driver to win the 2026 Daytona 500 per the rules of the NASCAR Cup Series (e.g., disqualification, driver withdraws), the corresponding market will resolve to “No”.

If the 2026 NASCAR Daytona 500 is cancelled, postponed past March 1, 2026, 11:59 PM ET,  or there is otherwise no winner declared within that timeframe, this market will resolve to “Other”.

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from NASCAR (https://www.nascar.com/).

events.title: NASCAR: Daytona 500 winner

question: Will Michael McDowell win the 2026 NASCAR Cup Series Daytona 500?
